vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) straight, upright, correct, right
1a) straight, level
1b) right, pleasing, correct
1c) straightforward, just, upright, fitting, proper
1d) uprightness, righteous, upright
1e) that which is upright (subst)
Also means: ya.shar (יָשָׁר "upright" H3477I)

1b) right, pleasing, correct

vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 筆直的, 正確的
1a) 筆直的
1b) 討喜歡的, 正確的
1c) 正直的, 公正的
1e) (作為名詞) 正直的事物
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 笔直的, 正确的
1a) 笔直的
1b) 讨喜欢的, 正确的
1c) 正直的, 公正的
1e) (作为名词) 正直的事物

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.10.13
§ 1) straight, upright, correct, right
1a) straight, level
1b) right, pleasing, correct
1c) straightforward, just, upright, fitting, proper
1d) uprightness, righteous, upright
1e) that which is upright (subst)
